sentences.sContent: Norris twice knocked down his opponent in the early rounds of the fight.
sentences.sCn: 诺里斯在拳击赛的头几个回合中，曾两度击倒他的对手。

remMethod.val: op(相反) ＋ pon(位置) ＋ ent(表人) → 立场不同的人 → 对手， 对抗者

trans.tranOther: someone who disagrees with a plan, idea, or system and wants to try to stop or change it
